2025.query: Intuit financial software competitors 2025 accounting tax preparation
2025.context: Intuit Inc. is a financial software company focused on TurboTax, QuickBooks, Credit Karma, and Mailchimp. AI-powered financial platform. SMB and consumer finance.

competitors.name: H&R Block
competitors.notes: Major tax preparation software competitor offering features for individual and business tax returns. Known for simplicity and ability to handle complex tax scenarios

competitors.name: TaxAct
competitors.notes: Tax preparation software noted for being very easy to use, with quick learning curve for new users

competitors.name: TaxSlayer
competitors.notes: Provides financial technology solutions for tax preparation in both business and individual sectors

competitors.name: Drake Software
competitors.notes: Tax preparation and e-file software for professional tax preparation industry

competitors.name: Thomson Reuters (OneSource)
competitors.notes: Enterprise tax software with ability to perform calculations and provide updates on regulations, focused on corporate tax

competitors.name: Bloomberg Tax
competitors.notes: Leading provider of tax research, analysis and compliance tools for tax professionals with comprehensive suite for complex tax scenarios

competitors.name: FreshBooks
competitors.notes: Cloud-based accounting and invoicing software for freelancers, self-employed professionals, and SMBs. Offers invoicing, expense tracking, time tracking, financial reporting, and online payments (founded 2003)

competitors.name: Zoho Books
competitors.notes: Competes vigorously with Intuit in financial software based on user experience, feature breadth, scalability, and value proposition

competitors.name: Patriot Software
competitors.notes: Online accounting and payroll software for small businesses

competitors.name: MYOB
competitors.notes: Designed for small businesses with various financial transaction management tools, famous for ease of use and handling complex accounting tasks

competitors.name: Acumatica Cloud ERP
competitors.notes: Cloud-based ERP with financial management, project accounting, and customer management for SMBs. Stands out for flexibility and integration capabilities

competitors.name: Jackson Hewitt
competitors.notes: Tax preparation company offering full-service tax preparation focused on maximum refunds and accuracy

mentionedBy.name: Paycom Software Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Small business payroll from QuickBooks maker

mentionedBy.name: SAP
mentionedBy.notes: Third-largest ERP vendor by revenue serving SMB segment with QuickBooks ecosystem and financial management solutions
